Back to George Frideric Handel

George Frideric Handel

Suite in F major, HWV 427

c. 1710–1717

[IMSLP page 1] · [IMSLP page 2]

Total duration: 8' 30" (without 5) or 10' (with 5)

  • 1. Adagio
  • 2. Allegro
  • 3. Adagio
  • 4. Allegro
  • 5. Allegro

Recommended editions

  • Hallische Händel-Ausgabe (Bärenreiter) · IV/1 · BA 4049 · Klavierwerke I / Erste Sammlung von 1720, Die achte großen Suiten · ed. Rudolf Steglich / Terence Best [including mov. 5]
  • Associated Board · Eight Great Suites, Book 1 · ed. Richard Jones
  • Bärenreiter · BA 4224 · Klavierwerke I / Erste Sammlung von 1720, Die achte großen Suiten · ed. Rudolf Steglich / Terence Best [including mov. 5]
  • Henle · HN 336 · Klaviersuiten (London 1720) · ed. Anthony Hicks [including mov. 5]
  • Wiener Urtext · UT 50119 · Klavierwerke II / Acht Große Suiten · ed. Peter Williams

1. Adagio

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2

2. Allegro

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

3. Adagio

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2

4. Allegro

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 3

5. Allegro

This movement exists only in an earlier version of the suite. It is based on an allegro in F major (HWV 488) and was later used as a prelude to the suite in G major (HWV 442).

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 1.5
